functions.name: Create Journey
functions.description: Allows a manager to create a new journey, defining its objectives, tasks, and participants.

functions.name: View Journey
functions.description: Enables a manager to view details of existing journeys, including progress and participant information.

functions.name: Update Journey
functions.description: Allows a manager to update the details of an existing journey, such as modifying tasks, dates, or participants.

functions.name: Delete Journey
functions.description: Enables a manager to delete a journey that is no longer needed, removing all associated tasks and data.

functions.name: Create Task
functions.description: Allows a manager to create new tasks within a journey, specifying task details and assignments.

functions.name: View Task
functions.description: Enables a manager to view details of tasks within a journey, including their status and assigned users.

functions.name: Update Task
functions.description: Allows a manager to update the details of existing tasks, such as changing the task description or deadlines.

functions.name: Delete Task
functions.description: Enables a manager to delete tasks that are no longer relevant or required within a journey.

functions.name: Add User to Journey
functions.description: Allows a manager to add a user to a journey, assigning them specific tasks and responsibilities.

functions.name: Add User to Team in Journey
functions.description: Enables a manager to add a user to a team within a journey, integrating them into team-specific tasks and roles.

functions.name: View Journeys of User
functions.description: Allows a manager to view all journeys a specific user is part of, providing an overview of their involvement and progress.

functions.name: Track Journey Progress
functions.description: Enables a manager to track the overall progress of a journey, monitoring task completion and milestones.

functions.name: Submit Feedback
functions.description: Allows a manager to submit feedback on tasks or journeys, providing constructive comments and evaluations.

functions.name: View Team Journeys
functions.description: Enables a manager to view journeys associated with specific teams, facilitating team management and coordination.

functions.name: Track Team Member Progress
functions.description: Allows a manager to track the progress of individual team members within a journey, ensuring accountability and performance.
